price: ហើយចូរអ្នកស្ដាប់នៅថ្ងៃដែលម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់ស្រែកហៅ ចេញពីកន្លែងដែលជិតបំផុត។
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
